mean_cn: n. （人体组织或表皮等跌、碰撞后产生的）青肿，挫伤；  v. 撞伤，碰伤，（使）挫伤，擦伤（表皮、表面）；打击
mean_en: a blue, brown or purple mark that appears on the skin after somebody has fallen, been hit, etc.
sentence: The little boy got several cuts and bruises from falling off his bicycle.
sentence_trans: 那个小男孩从自行车上摔了下来，弄得到处是严重的伤口和淤青。
